title: Daisy Lowe looks chic as she joins leather-clad Emilia Fox at star-studded fashion event
text:
She is rumoured to be dating singer Jack Peñate and has been spotted with him at several events recently.

Yet Daisy Lowe decided to go solo as she attended Halfpenny London's new Songbird wedding dress collection at Petersham Nurseries on Wednesday.

The model, 30, looked effortlessly chic as wore bridal white with a pair of satin flares teamed with a black vest top and velvet blazer.

Chic: Daisy Lowe attended Halfpenny London's new Songbird wedding dress collection at Petersham Nurseries on Wednesday

Adding some minimal accessories, Daisy completed her look with a gold chained handbag and a collection of silver necklaces.

The daughter of Pearl Lowe styled her signature raven locks and fringe into a tousled blow-dried hairdo, adding a slick of minimal make-up to enhance her pretty features.

Meanwhile fellow attendee, Emilia Fox, went for a more racy look as she wowed in a leather-looking ruffled midi skirt.

The Silent Witness star, 45, teased a glimpse of her toned midriff as she teamed the item of clothing with a black crop top and white satin blazer.

Work it: The model, 30, looked effortlessly chic as wore bridal white with a pair of satin flares teamed with a black vest top and velvet blazer

Racy: Meanwhile fellow attendee, Emilia Fox, went for a more racy look as she wowed in a leather-looking ruffled midi skirt with a silk crop top

Finishing her ensemble, Emilia opted for a pair of black statement heels with white ruffled flowers on them and a gold necklace.

The Delicious actress styled her brunette locks into a curly hairdo as she added a slick of radiant make-up.

Daisy went on to pose for a photo with bridal designer Kate Halfpenny herself who looked stylish in a black ensemble with an oversized white jacket draped over the top.

Also attending the event was Made In Chelsea star Millie Mackintosh and model Amber Le Bon, 30.

Designer: Daisy went on to pose for a photo with bridal designer Kate Halfpenny herself who looked stylish in a black ensemble with an oversized white jacket draped over the top

Elegant: Millie Mackintosh, 30, looked incredible in an all-white bridal-inspired ensemble, which consisted of tailored trousers with a ruffled jumper and grey suede heels

Dreamy: The former Made In Chelsea star, 30, wore a bespoke Kate Halfpenny dress for her wedding to Hugo Taylor in 2018 (pictured)

Millie, 30, looked incredible in an all-white bridal-inspired ensemble, which consisted of tailored trousers with a ruffled jumper and grey suede heels.

Dressing for the cool autumnal weather, she layered her look with a long camel coat which showcased her svelte frame.

Millie, who wore a bespoke Kate Halfpenny dress for her wedding to Hugo Taylor in 2018, styled her glossy brunette locks into a sleek straightened hairdo, adding a slick of minimal make-up.

Keeping warm: Dressing for the cool autumnal weather, she layered her look with a long camel coat which showcased her svelte frame (pictured with designer Kate Halfpenny)

Attendees: Amber Le Bon was also in attendance as she wore a pink floral midi dress with a camel coat over the top

Meanwhile Daisy is newly single after splitting from beau Cameron, 24, who she dated for almost a year before reportedly splitting over their six-year age gap.

Earlier this month, she was seen holding hands with musician Jack Peñate while they stepped out in a London park, they have since attended several events together.

Jack's biggest hit to date is his 2007 song Torn on the Platform, and he also has two top 20 albums.

Daisy, whose dating history includes The Crown's Matt Smith, Hurts singer Theo Hutchcraft and Thomas Cohen, was previously romantically linked to artist John Leigh.
description: The model, 30, looked effortlessly chic as wore bridal white with a pair of satin flares teamed with a black vest top and velvet blazer.
